document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2009-16
document.heading: APPROVING ZONE CHANGE PL09-0029 TO ADD SECTION 19.40.020(H) AND CHAPTER 19.50 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE RELATING TO REQUESTS FOR REASONABLE ACCOMMODATION IN THE APPLICATION OF THE CITY'S ZONING REGULATIONS UNDER THE FAIR HOUSING ACTS
